# I found a post preview mechanism I really like

I was browsing HN (I know) and stumbled upon a blog post from [this blog](https://https.www.google.com.tedunangst.com/flak/), which has a super intuitive post preview behavior. Maybe it'd be useful for Scuttlebutt post previews?

Things I like:

- the title isn't gigantic
- the title is a link to the post (woop)
- the first paragraph is shown by default (woop woop)
- it's enough information to understand the gist of the post
- it's not so much information that it's overstimulating or annoying

In cases where there isn't a title, maybe the first two paragraphs should be shown? or just one? I don't have any strong opinions but I thought it was cool and wanted to share.
